00055 void CNReporterCychp::defineOptions(BaseEngine& e)
00056 {
00057     e.defineOption("","cychp-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00058                     "Report CYCHP files",
00059                     "false");
00060 }

00065 
00066 void CNReporterCychp::run()
00067 {
00068     Verbose::out(1, "MAJOR PROGRESS UPDATE: Writing cychp output file.");
00069     isSetup();
00070     if (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cychp-output")) {return;}
00071     Verbose::out(1, "CNReporterCychp::run(...) Start");
00072     m_uiSegmentID = 0;
00073 
00074     AffxString strFileName = Fs::convertToUncPath(getFileName());
00075     Verbose::out(1, "Writing file: " + strFileName);
00076     try
00077     {
00078         writeCychpFile(strFileName);
00079 
00080         // Convert from calvin to text format?
00081         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("text-output"))
00082         {
00083             CalvinToText converter;
00084             converter.run(strFileName, strFileName + ".txt", true, true, true);
00085         }
00086     } catch(...) {throw(Except("CYCHP write failed for file: " + strFileName));}
00087     Verbose::out(1, "CNReporterCychp::run(...) End");
00088 }
00089 
00090 AffxString CNReporterCychp::getFileName()
00091 {
00092     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("result-files")) && (m_pEngine->getOptVector("result-files").size() > 0))
00093     {
00094         AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOptVector("result-files")[getExperiment()->getIndex()];
00095         if (strFileName != "") {return strFileName;}
00096     }
00097     AffxString strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName().toLowerCase();
00098     if (strExperimentName.endsWith(".cel"))
00099     {
00100         strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName().substring(0, (unsigned int)strExperimentName.length() - 4);
00101     }
00102     else {strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName();}
00103 
00104     AffxString strOutputDirectory = m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir");
00105     AffxString strAnalysisName    = m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00106     AffxString strPrefix          = m_pEngine->getOpt("file-name-prefix");
00107     AffxString strSuffix          = m_pEngine->getOpt("file-name-suffix");
00108     AffxString strExt             = m_pEngine->getOpt("file-name-ext");
00109 
00110     std::string prefixSeparator   = ".";
00111     std::string suffixSeparator   = ".";
00112     std::string analysisSeparator = ".";
00113 
00114     if (strPrefix.empty() || strPrefix == "none") {
00115         strPrefix = "";
00116         prefixSeparator = "";
00117     }
00118     if (strSuffix.empty() || strSuffix == "none") {
00119         strSuffix = "";
00120         suffixSeparator = "";
00121     }
00122     if (strAnalysisName.empty()) {
00123         analysisSeparator = "";
00124     }
00125     if (strExt.empty() || strExt == "none") {
00126         strExt = "cychp";
00127     }
00128 
00129     AffxString strFileName = Fs::join(strOutputDirectory,
00130                                       strPrefix          + prefixSeparator   +
00131                                       strExperimentName  + "."               +
00132                                       strSuffix          + suffixSeparator   +
00133                                       strAnalysisName    + analysisSeparator +
00134                                       strExt);
00135     return strFileName;
00136 }
00137 
00138 AffxString CNReporterCychp::getCelFileName()
00139 {
00140     AffxString strCelFileName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName();
00141 
00142     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cels"))
00143     {
00144         std::vector<std::string> vCelFiles = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels");
00145         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vCelFiles.size()); iIndex++)
00146         {
00147             AffxString str = vCelFiles[iIndex];
00148             if (str.startsWith(strCelFileName))
00149             {
00150                 strCelFileName = str;
00151                 break;
00152             }
00153             else
00154             {
00155               if (AffxString(Fs::basename(str)).startsWith(strCelFileName))
00156                 {
00157                     strCelFileName = str;
00158                     break;
00159                 }
00160             }
00161         }
00162     }
00163     m_strARRFileName = "";
00164     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("arrs")) && (m_pEngine->getOptVector("arrs").size() > 0))
00165     {
00166         m_strARRFileName = m_pEngine->getOptVector("arrs")[getExperiment()->getIndex()];
00167     }
00168     if (m_strARRFileName == "")
00169     {
00170         AffxString strTempFileName = strCelFileName;
00171         if (strTempFileName.toLowerCase().endsWith(".cel"))
00172         {
00173             m_strARRFileName = strCelFileName.substring(0, (unsigned int)strCelFileName.length() - 4) + ".ARR";
00174         }
00175         else
00176         {
00177             m_strARRFileName = strCelFileName + ".ARR";
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     return strCelFileName;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void CNReporterCychp::writeCychpFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00185 {
00186     const bool addGenotypingTable = m_pEngine->getEngineName() == "CNCytoEngine" && !m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
00187 
00188     int iSegmentTypeCount = 0;
00189     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00190     {
00191         CNAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00192         if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00193         {
00194             for (int iSegmentType = 1; (iSegmentType <= 7); iSegmentType++)
00195             {
00196                 if (pMethod->getSegmentCount(iSegmentType) > 0)
00197                 {
00198                     iSegmentTypeCount++;
00199                 }
00200             }
00201         }
00202     }
00203     // Omitting "Segments" table if there are no segments to report
00204     const int genotypingTableIndex = iSegmentTypeCount > 0 ? 4 : 3;
00205 
00206     AffxString strCelFileName = getCelFileName();
00207     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData data;
00208     data.Header().SetFilename(strFileName);
00209     data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Chromosomes"));
00210     data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"ProbeSets"));
00211     data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"AlgorithmData"));
00212     if (iSegmentTypeCount > 0) {
00213         data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Segments"));
00214     }
00215     if (addGenotypingTable) {
00216         data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Genotyping"));
00217     }
00218 
00219     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00220     pHeader->SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-multi-data-type-analysis");
00221     pHeader->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00222     pHeader->SetFileId(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00223 
00224     addParentHeader(pHeader, strCelFileName);
00225     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNReporterCychp::report(...)", 7, 1, 7);
00226     addHeaderParams(pHeader);
00227     addCNReferenceSelectedInfo(pHeader);
00228     addHeaderAlgorithmParams(pHeader);
00229     addHeaderClientMetaInfo(pHeader);
00230     addHeaderChipSummaryParams(pHeader);
00231 
00232     AffxArray<CNChromosome> arChromosomes;
00233     loadChromosomes(arChromosomes);
00234     addChromosomesSummaryDataSetHeader(data.Header().GetDataGroup(0), arChromosomes.getCount());
00235     addProbeSetsCopyNumberDataSetHeader(data.Header().GetDataGroup(1), m_pvProbeSets->getCount());
00236     int iRowCount = 0;
00237     for (int i = 0; (i < m_pvProbeSets->getCount()); i++)
00238     {
00239         CNProbeSet* p = m_pvProbeSets->getAt(i);
00240         if ((p->getAllelePeaks1() > 0) || (p->getAllelePeaks2() > 0)) {iRowCount++;}
00241     }
00242     addProbeSetsAllelePeaksDataSetHeader(data.Header().GetDataGroup(1), iRowCount);
00243     int iSnpCount = 0;
00244     int iVisualizationCount = 0;
00245     for (int i = 0; (i < m_pvProbeSets->getCount()); i++)
00246     {
00247         CNProbeSet* p = m_pvProbeSets->getAt(i);
00248         if ((p->isProcess()) && (p->processAsSNP()))
00249         {
00250             iSnpCount++;
00251         }
00252         if ((p->isProcess()) && (p->processAsVisualization()))
00253         {
00254             iVisualizationCount++;
00255         }
00256     }
00257     addAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignalDataSetHeader(data.Header().GetDataGroup(2), iVisualizationCount);
00258     if (iSegmentTypeCount > 0) {
00259         addSegmentsDataSets(data.Header().GetDataGroup(3));
00260     }
00261     if (addGenotypingTable) {
00262         addGenotypingDataSetHeader(data.Header().GetDataGroup(genotypingTableIndex), iSnpCount);
00263     }
00264 
00265     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer = new affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter(&data.Header());
00266     writer->WriteHeader();
00267 
00268     std::vector<int> vChromosomesOffsets(1);
00269     writeDataGroupHeader(writer, 0, vChromosomesOffsets);
00270 
00271     std::vector<int> vProbeSetsOffsets(2);
00272     writeDataGroupHeader(writer, 1, vProbeSetsOffsets);
00273     std::vector<int> vAlgorithmDataOffsets(1);
00274     writeDataGroupHeader(writer, 2, vAlgorithmDataOffsets);
00275 
00276     std::vector<int> vSegmentsOffsets;
00277     if (iSegmentTypeCount > 0) {
00278         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00279         vSegmentsOffsets.resize(iSegmentTypeCount);
00280         writeDataGroupHeader(writer, 3, vSegmentsOffsets);
00281     }
00282 
00283     std::vector<int> vGenotypeOffsets(1);
00284     if (addGenotypingTable) {
00285         writeDataGroupHeader(writer, genotypingTableIndex, vGenotypeOffsets);
00286     }
00287 
00288     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00289     writeChromosomesSummaryDataSet(writer, 0, 0, vChromosomesOffsets, arChromosomes);
00290     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00291     writeProbeSetsCopyNumberDataSet(writer, 1, 0, vProbeSetsOffsets, *m_pvProbeSets);
00292     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00293     writeProbeSetsAllelePeaksDataSet(writer, 1, 1, vProbeSetsOffsets, *m_pvProbeSets);
00294     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00295     writeAlgorthmDataMarkerABSignalDataSet(writer, 2, 0, vAlgorithmDataOffsets, *m_pvProbeSets);
00296     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00297     if (iSegmentTypeCount > 0)
00298     {
00299         int iDataSetIndex = 0;
00300         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00301         {
00302             CNAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00303             if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00304             {
00305                 for (int iSegmentType = 1; (iSegmentType <= 7); iSegmentType++)
00306                 {
00307                     if (pMethod->getSegmentCount(iSegmentType) > 0)
00308                     {
00309                         writeSegmentsDataSet(writer, 3, iDataSetIndex, vSegmentsOffsets, pMethod->getSegments(), (short)iSegmentType);
00310                         iDataSetIndex++;
00311                     }
00312                 }
00313             }
00314         }
00315     }
00316     if (addGenotypingTable) {
00317         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00318         writeGenInfoDataSet(writer, genotypingTableIndex, 0, vGenotypeOffsets, *m_pvProbeSets);
00319     }
00320     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00321 
00322     delete writer;
00323     arChromosomes.deleteAll();
00324     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00325 }
00326 
00327 void CNReporterCychp::addParentHeader(  affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader,
00328                                         AffxString& strFileName)
00329 {
00330     // Copy over headers from the cel file.
00331     try
00332     {
00333         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00334         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00335         reader.SetFilename(strFileName.c_str());
00336         reader.Open(genericData);
00337         pHeader->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00338         genericData.Clear();
00339     } catch(...) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Load parent header failed for file: " + strFileName);}
00340 }

00342 void CNReporterCychp::addHeaderParams(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00343 {
00344     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00345 
00346     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-name");
00347     param.SetValueText(L"CYTO2");
00348     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00349 
00350     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-version");
00351     
00352     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(AptVersionInfo::reportRelease()));
00353     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00354 
00355     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-array-type");
00356     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(getArrayName()));
00357     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00358 
00359     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-ArraySet");
00360     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(getArrayName()));
00361     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00362 
00363     param.SetName(L"program-name");
00364     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_pEngine->getOpt("program-name")));
00365     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00366 
00367     param.SetName(L"program-version");
00368     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_pEngine->getOpt("program-version")));
00369     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00370 
00371     param.SetName(L"program-company");
00372     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("Affymetrix"));
00373     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00374 
00375     param.SetName(L"create-date");
00376     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Util::getTimeStamp()));
00377     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00378 
00379     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-meta-data-version");
00380     param.SetValueInt32(1);
00381     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00382 
00383     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-name");
00384     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileName())));
00385     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00386 
00387     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-guid");
00388     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileGuid()));
00389     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00390 
00391 }

00393 void CNReporterCychp::addHeaderClientMetaInfo(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00394 {
00395   ParameterNameValueType param;
00396   vector<pair<string, string> > metaData = m_pEngine->getMetaDataDescription();
00397   for (int i = 0; i < metaData.size(); i++) {
00398     pair<string,string> p = metaData[i];
00399     string key = "affymetrix-application-meta-data-info-" + p.first;
00400     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(key));
00401     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(p.second));
00402     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00403   }
00404 
00405 }

00408 void CNReporterCychp::addHeaderAlgorithmParams(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00409 {
00410     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00411 
00412     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-cychp-file-version");
00413     param.SetValueInt32(1);
00414     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00415 
00416     // dump options
00417     vector<string> optionNames;
00418     m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
00419     std::vector<PgOpt::PgOptType> optionTypes;
00420     m_pEngine->getOptionTypes(optionTypes,1);
00421     for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
00422         std::string name = optionNames[i];
00423         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
00424         if (vals.size() > 1)
00425         {
00426             for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
00427             {
00428                 std::string val = vals[j];
00429                 loadParam("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name + "-" + ::getInt(j+1), optionTypes[i], val, param);
00430                 pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00431             }
00432         }
00433         else
00434         {
00435             std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
00436             loadParam("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-" + name, optionTypes[i], val, param);
00437             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00438         }
00439     }
00440     // dump state.
00441     std::vector<std::string> stateNames;
00442     m_pEngine->getOptionNames(stateNames);
00443     std::vector<PgOpt::PgOptType> stateTypes;
00444     m_pEngine->getOptionTypes(stateTypes);
00445     for(int i=0; i< stateNames.size(); i++) {
00446         std::string name = stateNames[i];
00447         std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name);
00448         if (vals.size() > 1)
00449         {
00450             for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
00451             {
00452                 std::string val = vals[j];
00453                 loadParam("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name + "-" + ::getInt(j+1), stateTypes[i], val, param);
00454                 pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00455             }
00456         }
00457         else
00458         {
00459             std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name);
00460             loadParam("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-" + name, stateTypes[i], val, param);
00461             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00462         }
00463     }
00464 
00465     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)CNAnalysisMethod::getParams()->size()); iIndex++)
00466     {
00467         pHeader->AddNameValParam(CNAnalysisMethod::getParams()->at(iIndex));
00468     }
00469     // Copy over cel file names.
00470     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("create-reference"))
00471     {
00472         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("create-reference"))
00473         {
00474             if (CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->size() > 0)
00475             {
00476                 for (unsigned int uiParamIndex = 0; (uiParamIndex < CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->size()); uiParamIndex++)
00477                 {
00478                     pHeader->AddNameValParam(CNAnalysisMethod::getCelFileParams()->at(uiParamIndex));
00479                 }
00480             }
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     // Copy over headers from the annotation file.
00485     if (Annotation::getParams()->size() > 0)
00486     {
00487         for (unsigned int uiParamIndex = 0; (uiParamIndex < Annotation::getParams()->size()); uiParamIndex++)
00488         {
00489             pHeader->AddNameValParam(Annotation::getParams()->at(uiParamIndex));
00490         }
00491     }
00492 }

00494 void CNReporterCychp::addCNReferenceHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00495 {
00496 
00497     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00498     int iNumberOfHeaders = m_pobjExperiment->getCNReferenceHeader()->size();
00499 
00500     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfHeaders; iIndex++)
00501     {
00502         AffxString strParameterName = "affymetrix-CNReferenceHeader-";
00503         AffxString strHeaderLine =( *(m_pobjExperiment->getCNReferenceHeader()))[iIndex];
00504 
00505         AffxString strTempString1  = strHeaderLine.getKey();
00506         AffxString strTempString2  = strTempString1.removeCruft();
00507         strParameterName += strTempString2;
00508         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strParameterName));
00509 
00510         AffxString strValue = strHeaderLine.getValue();
00511         param.SetValueAscii(strValue);
00512 
00513         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00514     }
00515 }

00517 void CNReporterCychp::addCNReferenceSelectedInfo(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00518 {
00519     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00520     int iNumberOfHeaders = m_pobjExperiment->getCNReferenceHeader()->size();
00521 
00522     // Options from the CN reference header to show in this CYCHP header
00523     std::set<std::string> allowedHeaderItems;
00524     allowedHeaderItems.insert("guid");
00525     allowedHeaderItems.insert("algorithm-param-apt-state-reference-file");
00526 
00527     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfHeaders; iIndex++)
00528     {
00529         AffxString strParameterName = "affymetrix-CNReferenceHeader-";
00530         AffxString strHeaderLine =( *(m_pobjExperiment->getCNReferenceHeader()))[iIndex];
00531 
00532         AffxString strTempString1  = strHeaderLine.getKey();
00533         AffxString strTempString2  = strTempString1.removeCruft();
00534         if (allowedHeaderItems.count(strTempString2))
00535         {
00536             strParameterName += strTempString2;
00537             param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strParameterName));
00538     
00539             AffxString strValue = strHeaderLine.getValue();
00540             param.SetValueAscii(strValue);
00541     
00542             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00543         }
00544     }
00545 }

00547 void CNReporterCychp::addHeaderChipSummaryParams(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader)
00548 {
00549     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00550 
00551     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-raw-intensity-ratio-gender");
00552     param.SetValueAscii(m_pobjExperiment->getRawIntensityRatioGender());
00553     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00554 
00555     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-raw-intensity-ratio");
00556     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getRawIntensityRatio());
00557     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00558 
00559     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-XX-ratio");
00560     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getXXRatio());
00561     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00562 
00563     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-ratio");
00564     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getYRatio());
00565     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00566 
00567     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-XX");
00568     param.SetValueInt32(m_pobjExperiment->hasXX() ? 1 : 0);
00569     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00570 
00571     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y");
00572     param.SetValueInt32(m_pobjExperiment->hasY() ? 1 : 0);
00573     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00574 
00575     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-call-computed");
00576     param.SetValueInt32(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGenderComputed() ? 1 : 0);
00577     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00578 
00579     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-call");
00580     param.SetValueAscii(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00581     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00582 
00583     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-not-zero");
00584     param.SetValueInt32(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGenderNotZero());
00585     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00586 
00587     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-Y-count");
00588     param.SetValueInt32(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGenderYCount());
00589     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00590 
00591     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-confidence");
00592     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGenderConfidence());
00593     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00594 
00595     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-Y-gender-ratio");
00596     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getCNCallGenderRatio());
00597     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00598 
00599     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-MedianAutosomeMedian");
00600     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian());
00601     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00602 
00603     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-MAPD");
00604     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN());
00605     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00606 
00607     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-iqr");
00608     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getIqr());
00609     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00610 
00611     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-all_probeset_rle_mean");
00612     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle());
00613     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00614 
00615     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-gc-correction-size");
00616     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric());
00617     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00618 
00619     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-call-rate");
00620     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getCallRate());
00621     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00622 
00623     if (CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->getCount() != m_pobjExperiment->getQCMetricColumnValues()->getCount())
00624     {
00625         Err::errAbort("Mismatch occurred between QC Metric column names count and QC Metric column values count.");
00626     }
00627     for (int iMetricIndex = 0; (iMetricIndex < CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->getCount()); iMetricIndex++)
00628     {
00629         if ((*CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->getAt(iMetricIndex)).endsWith("_gender"))
00630         {
00631             param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-" + *CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->getAt(iMetricIndex)));
00632             param.SetValueAscii(*m_pobjExperiment->getQCMetricColumnValues()->getAt(iMetricIndex));
00633             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00634         }
00635         else
00636         {
00637             param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-" + *CNExperiment::getQCMetricColumnNames()->getAt(iMetricIndex)));
00638             param.SetValueFloat((float)::getDouble(*m_pobjExperiment->getQCMetricColumnValues()->getAt(iMetricIndex)));
00639             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00640         }
00641     }
00642 
00643     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-wave-count"));
00644     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getNumberOfWavesUsed());
00645     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00646 
00647     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-sample-median-cn-state"));
00648     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getMedianCnState());
00649     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00650 
00651     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-sample-hom-frequency"));
00652     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getHomFrequency());
00653     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00654 
00655     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-sample-het-frequency"));
00656     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getHetFrequency());
00657     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00658 
00659     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-median-raw-intensity"));
00660     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getMedianRawIntensity());
00661     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00662 
00663     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-antigenomic-ratio"));
00664     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getAntigenomicRatio());
00665     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00666 
00667     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2"))
00668     {
00669         if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-use-contrast"))
00670         {
00671             param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc-algorithm");
00672             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("snp-qc-use-contrast"))
00673             {
00674                 param.SetValueAscii("CQC");
00675             }
00676             else
00677             {
00678                 param.SetValueAscii("PVQC");
00679             }
00680             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00681         }
00682         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc"));
00683         param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getSNPQC());
00684         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00685     }
00686     else
00687     {
00688         param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc-algorithm");
00689         param.SetValueAscii("EMQC");
00690         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00691 
00692         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-snp-qc"));
00693         param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getSNPQC());
00694         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00695 
00696         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-raw-snp-qc"));
00697         param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getRawSNPQC());
00698         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00699     }
00700 
00701     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-genome-LOH"));
00702     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getGenomeLOH());
00703     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00704 
00705     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-autosome-genome-LOH"));
00706     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getAutosomeGenomeLOH());
00707     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00708 
00709     // CN waviness parameters
00710     int segCountLoss, segCountGain;
00711     float sd;
00712     wavinessSegCounts(segCountLoss, segCountGain, sd);
00713 
00714     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-seg-count-loss"));
00715     param.SetValueInt32(segCountLoss);
00716     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00717 
00718     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-seg-count-gain"));
00719     param.SetValueInt32(segCountGain);
00720     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00721 
00722     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-seg-count"));
00723     if (segCountLoss == -1 && segCountGain == -1) {
00724         param.SetValueInt32(-1);
00725     } else {
00726         param.SetValueInt32(segCountLoss + segCountGain);
00727     }
00728     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00729 
00730     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-sd"));
00731     param.SetValueFloat(sd);
00732     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00733 
00734     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method")     &&
00735         m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != "none" &&
00736         m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != "")
00737     {
00738         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("affymetrix-chipsummary-waviness-amplitudes"));
00739         param.SetValueAscii(wavinessAmplitudes());
00740         pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00741     }
00742 
00743     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-chipsummary-log2-ratio-gradient");
00744     param.SetValueFloat(m_pobjExperiment->getL2Gradient());
00745     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00746 }
00747 
00748 void CNReporterCychp::loadChromosomes(AffxArray<CNChromosome>& arChromosomes)
00749 {
00750     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00751     const double alhpaCNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-cn-calibrate");
00752     const double alhpa_X_CNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-X-cn-calibrate");
00753     const double alhpa_Y_CNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate");
00754     const double betaCNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-cn-calibrate");
00755     const double beta_X_CNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-X-cn-calibrate");
00756     const double beta_Y_CNCalibrate = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-Y-cn-calibrate");
00757     int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00758     int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00759 
00760     int iMaxChromosome = 0;
00761     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00762     {
00763         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00764         if (!pobjProbeSet->isProcess()) {continue;}
00765         iMaxChromosome = Max(iMaxChromosome, (int)pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
00766     }
00767     arChromosomes.deleteAll();
00768     for (int iChromosome = 0; iChromosome <= iMaxChromosome; iChromosome++)
00769     {
00770         float fMinLog2Ratio = 1000000;
00771         float fMaxLog2Ratio = -1000000;
00772         std::vector<float> vLog2Ratios;
00773         vLog2Ratios.clear();
00774         int iMarkerCount = 0;
00775         int iTotalMarkerCount = 0;
00776         int iSnpCount = 0;
00777         int iHomCount = 0;
00778         int iHetCount = 0;
00779         int iStartIndex = -1;
00780         float fConfidenceThreshold = CNAnalysisMethod::getConfidenceThreshold(m_pEngine->getOpt("brlmmp-parameters"));
00781         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00782         {
00783             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00784             if (!pobjProbeSet->isProcess() ) {continue;}
00785             if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome)
00786             {
00787                 if(pobjProbeSet->processAsCN())
00788                 {
00789                     vLog2Ratios.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00790                     fMinLog2Ratio = Min(fMinLog2Ratio, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00791                     fMaxLog2Ratio = Max(fMaxLog2Ratio, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00792                     iMarkerCount++;
00793                 }
00794                 iTotalMarkerCount++;
00795                 if (iStartIndex == -1) {iStartIndex = iIndex;}
00796                 if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP())
00797                 {
00798                     if (isCytoScanHD && (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence() >= fConfidenceThreshold)) {continue;}
00799                     if ((pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 0) || (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 2))
00800                     {
00801                         iHomCount++;
00802                     }
00803                     if (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 1)
00804                     {
00805                         iHetCount++;
00806                     }
00807                     iSnpCount++;
00808                 }
00809             }
00810         }
00811         if (iMarkerCount > 0)
00812         {
00813             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vCytoScanLog2Ratios(iMarkerCount);
00814             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vCnState(iMarkerCount);
00815             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vMosaicismMixture(iMarkerCount);
00816             int iMarkerIndex = 0;
00817             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00818             {
00819                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00820                 if (!pobjProbeSet->isProcess() || !pobjProbeSet->processAsCN()) {continue;}
00821                 if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome)
00822                 {
00823                     vCytoScanLog2Ratios.set(iMarkerIndex, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00824                     float fCalibratedLog2Ratio = 0.0;
00825                     if (iChromosome < iXChromosome) {
00826                         fCalibratedLog2Ratio = (float)exp(((pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() / alhpaCNCalibrate) + betaCNCalibrate) * log(2.0));
00827                     }
00828                     else if (iChromosome == iXChromosome) {
00829                         fCalibratedLog2Ratio = (float)exp(((pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() / alhpa_X_CNCalibrate) + beta_X_CNCalibrate) * log(2.0));
00830                     }
00831                     else if (iChromosome == iYChromosome) {
00832                         fCalibratedLog2Ratio = (float)exp(((pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() / alhpa_Y_CNCalibrate) + beta_Y_CNCalibrate) * log(2.0));
00833                     }
00834                     vCnState.set(iMarkerIndex, fCalibratedLog2Ratio);
00835                     if (!isCytoScanHD && (pobjProbeSet->getMosaicismMixture() == numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN()))
00836                     {
00837                         vMosaicismMixture.set(iMarkerIndex, 0);
00838                     }
00839                     else
00840                     {
00841                         vMosaicismMixture.set(iMarkerIndex, pobjProbeSet->getMosaicismMixture());
00842                     }
00843                     iMarkerIndex++;
00844                 }
00845             }
00846             CNChromosome* p = new CNChromosome;
00847             p->m_ucChromosome = (unsigned char)iChromosome;
00848             if (iChromosome == m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome")) {p->m_strDisplay = "X";}
00849             else if (iChromosome == m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome")) {p->m_strDisplay = "Y";}
00850             else {p->m_strDisplay = ::getInt(iChromosome);}
00851             p->m_uiStartIndex = iStartIndex;
00852             p->m_uiMarkerCount = iTotalMarkerCount;
00853             p->m_fMinSignal = fMinLog2Ratio;
00854             p->m_fMaxSignal = fMaxLog2Ratio;
00855             if (isCytoScanHD) {p->m_fMedianSignal = vCytoScanLog2Ratios.median();}
00856             else
00857             {
00858                 std::nth_element(vLog2Ratios.begin(), vLog2Ratios.begin()+iMarkerCount/2, vLog2Ratios.end());
00859                 p->m_fMedianSignal = vLog2Ratios[iMarkerCount/2];
00860             }
00861             p->m_fMedianCnState = (float)vCnState.median();
00862             p->m_fHomFrequency = (float)((double)iHomCount / (double)iSnpCount);
00863             p->m_fHetFrequency = (float)((double)iHetCount / (double)iSnpCount);
00864             p->m_fMosaicism = (float)vMosaicismMixture.median();
00865             p->m_fChromosomeLOH = numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN();
00866             for(int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getExperiment()->getNumberOfChromosomesToReport()); iIndex++)
00867             {
00868                 std::pair<char, float> pairLOH;
00869                 try {pairLOH = getExperiment()->getChromosomeLOH(iIndex);} catch(...) {continue;}
00870                 if(pairLOH.first == iChromosome)
00871                 {
00872                     p->m_fChromosomeLOH = pairLOH.second;
00873                     break;
00874                 }
00875                 else
00876                 {
00877                     if (isCytoScanHD) {p->m_fChromosomeLOH = numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN();}
00878                     else {p->m_fChromosomeLOH = 0.0;}
00879                 }
00880             }
00881 
00882             arChromosomes.add(p);
00883         }
00884     }
00885 }
00886 
00887 void CNReporterCychp::addChromosomesSummaryDataSetHeader(       affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group,
00888                                                                 int iRowCount)
00889 {
00890     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsh;
00891     dsh.SetRowCnt(iRowCount);
00892     dsh.SetName(L"Summary");
00893     dsh.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00894     dsh.AddAsciiColumn(L"Display", 4);
00895     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"StartIndex");
00896     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
00897     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"MinSignal");
00898     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"MaxSignal");
00899     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"MedianCnState");
00900     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"HomFrequency");
00901     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"HetFrequency");
00902     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"Mosaicism");
00903     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"LOH");
00904     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"MedianSignal");
00905     group.AddDataSetHdr(dsh);
00906 }
00907 
00908 int CNReporterCychp::getMaxProbeSetNameLength()
00909 {
00910     int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00911     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00912     {
00913         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00914         iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
00915     }
00916     return iMaxProbeSetNameLength;
00917 }
00918 
00919 void CNReporterCychp::addProbeSetsCopyNumberDataSetHeader(      affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group,
00920                                                                 int iRowCount)
00921 {
00922     int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = getMaxProbeSetNameLength();
00923     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsh;
00924     dsh.SetRowCnt(iRowCount);
00925     dsh.SetName(L"CopyNumber");
00926     dsh.AddAsciiColumn(L"ProbeSetName", iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1);
00927     dsh.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00928     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"Position");
00929     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"Log2Ratio");
00930     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"WeightedLog2Ratio");
00931     dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"SmoothSignal");
00932     group.AddDataSetHdr(dsh);
00933 }

00950 void CNReporterCychp::addAlgorithmDataMarkerABSignalDataSetHeader(      affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group,
00951                                                                         int iRowCount)
00952 {
00953     const bool cyto2Run = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
00954

00956     dsh.SetRowCnt(iRowCount);
00957     dsh.SetName(L"MarkerABSignal");

00960         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"ASignal");

00967 void CNReporterCychp::addGenotypingDataSetHeader(      affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group,

00983 
00984 void CNReporterCychp::addSegmentsDataSets(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group)
00985 {
00986     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00987     {
00988         CNAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00989         if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00990         {
00991             for (int iSegmentType = 1; (iSegmentType <= 7); iSegmentType++)
00992             {
00993                 int iCount = pMethod->getSegmentCount(iSegmentType);
00994                 if (iCount > 0)
00995                 {
00996                     setupSegmentsDataSetHeader(group, iCount, (short)iSegmentType);
00997                 }
00998             }
00999         }
01000     }
01001 }
01002 
01003 void CNReporterCychp::setupSegmentsDataSetHeader(    affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& group,
01004                                                      int iRowCount,
01005                                                      short nSegmentType)
01006 {
01007     AffxString strName = CNSegment::getSegmentTypeString(nSegmentType);
01008     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsh;
01009     dsh.SetRowCnt(iRowCount);
01010     dsh.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
01011     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"SegmentID");
01012     dsh.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
01013     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"StartPosition");
01014     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"StopPosition");
01015     dsh.AddIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
01016     dsh.AddUIntColumn(L"MeanMarkerDistance");
01017     if (strName != "CN")
01018     {
01019         dsh.AddUByteColumn(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
01020         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"Confidence");
01021     }
01022     if (strName == "CN")
01023     {
01024         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"State");
01025         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"Confidence");
01026     }
01027     if (strName == "Mosaicism")
01028     {
01029         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"State");
01030         dsh.AddFloatColumn(L"Mixture");
01031     }
01032     group.AddDataSetHdr(dsh);
01033 }
01034 
01035 void CNReporterCychp::writeDataGroupHeader(     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01036                                                 int iGroupIndex,
01037                                                 std::vector<int>& vOffsets)
01038 {
01039     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupWriter& group = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex);
01040     group.WriteHeader();
01041     int iDataSetCount = (int)vOffsets.size();
01042     for (int iDataSetIndex = 0; (iDataSetIndex < iDataSetCount); iDataSetIndex++)
01043     {
01044         group.GetDataSetWriter(iDataSetIndex).WriteHeader();
01045         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = group.GetDataSetWriter(iDataSetIndex);
01046         vOffsets[iDataSetIndex] = pWriter->GetFilePos();
01047         pWriter->SeekFromCurrentPos(set.GetDataSetSize() + 1);
01048         set.UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
01049         group.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
01050     }
01051 }

01053 void CNReporterCychp::writeChromosomesSummaryDataSet(  affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01054                                                         int iGroupIndex,
01055                                                         int iSetIndex,
01056                                                         std::vector<int>& vOffsets,
01057                                                         AffxArray<CNChromosome>& arChromosomes)
01058 {
01059     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
01060     pWriter->SeekFromBeginPos(vOffsets[iSetIndex]);
01061     int iSize = 0;
01062     iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01063     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01064     iSize += 4;
01065     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01066     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01067     iSize += sizeof(float);
01068     iSize += sizeof(float);
01069     iSize += sizeof(float);
01070     iSize += sizeof(float);
01071     iSize += sizeof(float);
01072     iSize += sizeof(float);
01073     iSize += sizeof(float);
01074     int iStructCount = 100000;
01075     char* pBuffer = new char[iSize * iStructCount];
01076     int iIndex = 0;
01077     int iCount = 0;
01078     AffxString str;
01079     for (int iChromosomeIndex = 0; (iChromosomeIndex < arChromosomes.getCount()); iChromosomeIndex++)
01080     {
01081         CNChromosome* p = arChromosomes.getAt(iChromosomeIndex);
01082         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->m_ucChromosome);
01083         str = prepareAscii(p->m_strDisplay, 4);
01084         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, str, 4);
01085         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->m_uiStartIndex);
01086         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->m_uiMarkerCount);
01087         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fMinSignal);
01088         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fMaxSignal);
01089         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fMedianCnState);
01090         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fHomFrequency);
01091         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fHetFrequency);
01092         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fMosaicism);
01093         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fChromosomeLOH);
01094         loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->m_fMedianSignal);
01095 
01096         iCount++;
01097         if (iCount >= iStructCount)
01098         {
01099             set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);
01100             iCount = 0;
01101             iIndex = 0;
01102         }
01103     }
01104     if (iCount > 0) {set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);}
01105     delete[] pBuffer;
01106 }

01108 void CNReporterCychp::writeProbeSetsCopyNumberDataSet( affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01109                                                         int iGroupIndex,
01110                                                         int iSetIndex,
01111                                                         std::vector<int>& vOffsets,
01112                                                         CNProbeSetArray& arProbeSets)
01113 {
01114     int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
01115     int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
01116     int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = getMaxProbeSetNameLength();
01117     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
01118     pWriter->SeekFromBeginPos(vOffsets[iSetIndex]);
01119 
01120     int iSize = 0;
01121     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01122     iSize += (iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1);
01123     iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01124     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01125     iSize += sizeof(float);
01126     iSize += sizeof(float);
01127     iSize += sizeof(float);
01128     int iStructCount = 100000;
01129     char* pBuffer = new char[iSize * iStructCount];
01130     int iIndex = 0;
01131     int iCount = 0;
01132     AffxString str;
01133     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < arProbeSets.getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
01134     {
01135         CNProbeSet* p = arProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01136         if (!p->isProcess()) {continue;}
01137         if( !p->processAsCN())
01138         {
01139                 str = prepareAscii(p->getProbeSetName(), iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1);
01140                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, str, (iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1));
01141                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getChromosome());
01142                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getPosition());
01143                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
01144                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
01145                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
01146                 iCount++;
01147         }
01148         else
01149         {
01150                 str = prepareAscii(p->getProbeSetName(), iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1);
01151                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, str, (iMaxProbeSetNameLength + 1));
01152                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getChromosome());
01153                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getPosition());
01154                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getLog2Ratio());
01155                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getLog2RatioMedianSmooth());
01156                 if (p->getChromosome() < iXChromosome) {
01157                     loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getCalibratedSmoothedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-cn-calibrate")));
01158                 }
01159                 else if (p->getChromosome() == iXChromosome) {
01160                     loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getCalibratedSmoothedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-X-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-X-cn-calibrate")));
01161                 }
01162                 else if (p->getChromosome() == iYChromosome) {
01163                     loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getCalibratedSmoothedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-Y-cn-calibrate")));
01164                 }
01165                 else {
01166                     loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (float)0.0);
01167                 }
01168 
01169                 iCount++;
01170         }
01171         if (iCount >= iStructCount)
01172         {
01173             set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);
01174             iCount = 0;
01175             iIndex = 0;
01176         }
01177     }
01178     if (iCount > 0) {set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);}
01179     delete[] pBuffer;
01180 }

01182 void CNReporterCychp::writeAlgorthmDataMarkerABSignalDataSet(  affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01183                                                                 int iGroupIndex,
01184                                                                 int iSetIndex,
01185                                                                 std::vector<int>& vOffsets,
01186                                                                 CNProbeSetArray& arProbeSets)
01187 {
01188     const bool cyto2flag = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
01189 
01190     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
01191     pWriter->SeekFromBeginPos(vOffsets[iSetIndex]);
01192 
01193     int iSize = 0;
01194     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01195     if (cyto2flag) {
01196         iSize += sizeof(float);
01197         iSize += sizeof(float);
01198     }
01199     iSize += sizeof(float);
01200     int iStructCount = 100000;
01201     char* pBuffer = new char[iSize * iStructCount];
01202     int iIndex = 0;

01206     {
01207         CNProbeSet* p = arProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01208         if (!p->isProcess()) {continue;}
01209         if (p->processAsVisualization())
01210         {
01211             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, uiIndex);
01212             if (cyto2flag) {
01213                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getAAlleleSignal());
01214                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getBAlleleSignal());
01215                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getSCAR());
01216             } else {
01217                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getAllelicDifference());
01218             }
01219 
01220             iCount++;
01221             if (iCount >= iStructCount)
01222             {
01223                 set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);
01224                 iCount = 0;
01225                 iIndex = 0;
01226             }
01227         }
01228         uiIndex++;
01229     }
01230     if (iCount > 0) {set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);}
01231     delete[] pBuffer;

01282 void CNReporterCychp::writeSegmentsDataSet(     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01283                                                 int iGroupIndex,
01284                                                 int iSetIndex,
01285                                                 std::vector<int>& vOffsets,
01286                                                 CNSegmentArray& arSegments,
01287                                                 short nSegmentType)
01288 {
01289     AffxString strName = CNSegment::getSegmentTypeString(nSegmentType);
01290     bool bMosaicism = (strName == "Mosaicism");
01291     bool bCN = (strName == "CN");
01292     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
01293     pWriter->SeekFromBeginPos(vOffsets[iSetIndex]);
01294 
01295     int iSize = 0;
01296     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01297     iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01298     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01299     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01300     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01301     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01302     if (!bCN)
01303     {
01304         iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01305         iSize += sizeof(float);
01306     }
01307     if (bCN)
01308     {
01309         iSize += sizeof(float);
01310         iSize += sizeof(float);
01311     }
01312     if (bMosaicism)
01313     {
01314         iSize += sizeof(float);
01315         iSize += sizeof(float);
01316     }
01317     int iStructCount = 100000;
01318     char* pBuffer = new char[iSize * iStructCount];
01319     int iIndex = 0;
01320     int iCount = 0;
01321     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < arSegments.getCount()); iSegmentIndex++)
01322     {
01323         CNSegment* p = arSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01324         if (p->getSegmentType() == nSegmentType)
01325         {
01326             m_uiSegmentID++;
01327             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, m_uiSegmentID);
01328             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getChromosome());
01329             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getStartPosition());
01330             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getEndPosition());
01331             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getMarkerCount());
01332             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)p->getMeanMarkerDistance()); // In base pairs
01333             if (!bCN)
01334             {
01335                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getCall());
01336                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getConfidence());
01337             }
01338             if (bCN)
01339             {
01340                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (float)p->getCall());
01341                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getConfidence());
01342             }
01343             if (bMosaicism)
01344             {
01345                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getCalibratedCN());
01346                 // convert our enum.
01347                 float tmp=MosaicClassToFloat(p->getMixture());
01348                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, tmp);
01349             }
01350 
01351             iCount++;
01352             if (iCount >= iStructCount)
01353             {
01354                 set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);
01355                 iCount = 0;
01356                 iIndex = 0;
01357             }
01358         }
01359     }
01360     if (iCount > 0) {set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);}
01361     delete[] pBuffer;
01362 }
01363 
01364 void CNReporterCychp::writeGenInfoDataSet(    affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* pWriter,
01365                                                int iGroupIndex,
01366                                                int iSetIndex,
01367                                                std::vector<int>& vOffsets,
01368                                                CNProbeSetArray& arProbeSets)
01369 {
01370     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& set = pWriter->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
01371     pWriter->SeekFromBeginPos(vOffsets[iSetIndex]);
01372 
01373     int iSize = 0;
01374     iSize += sizeof(unsigned int);
01375     iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01376     iSize += sizeof(float);
01377     iSize += sizeof(unsigned char);
01378     iSize += sizeof(float);
01379     iSize += sizeof(float);
01380     iSize += sizeof(float);
01381     iSize += sizeof(float);
01382     int iStructCount = 100000;
01383     char* pBuffer = new char[iSize * iStructCount];
01384     int iIndex = 0;
01385     int iCount = 0;
01386     unsigned int uiIndex = 0;
01387     float fConfidenceThreshold = CNAnalysisMethod::getConfidenceThreshold(m_pEngine->getOpt("brlmmp-parameters"));
01388 
01389     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < arProbeSets.getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
01390     {
01391         CNProbeSet* p = arProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01392         // the three if clauses here (isProcess, SNP, confidence)
01393         // should sync up with if clauses in CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::calculateCallRate()
01394 
01395         if (!p->isProcess()) {continue;}
01396         if (p->processAsSNP())
01397         {
01398             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, uiIndex);
01399             if (p->getGenotypeConfidence() >= fConfidenceThreshold) {
01400                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)ALLELE_NO_CALL);
01401             } else {
01402                 loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getGenotypeCallCode());
01403             }
01404             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getGenotypeConfidence());
01405             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned char)p->getGenotypeCallCode());
01406             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getAAlleleSignal());
01407             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getBAlleleSignal());
01408             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getSignalStrengthMvA());
01409             loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, p->getSignalContrastMvA());
01410 
01411             iCount++;
01412             if (iCount >= iStructCount)
01413             {
01414                 set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);
01415                 iCount = 0;
01416                 iIndex = 0;
01417             }
01418         }
01419         uiIndex++;
01420     }
01421     if (iCount > 0) {set.WriteBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex);}
01422     delete[] pBuffer;
01423 }
